Description: variable this grouping level is for
value of the variable we are grouping by
if the group is a categorical variable, then the description of the category in the group_by_value column. Otherwise NA
what sex this row is grouped under. Allowed values are, "male", "female" and "NA" for not grouped under a sex
observed risk for time period e.g. 1-year observed risk
number of observed events for time pertiod. e.g. 1-year observed events
predicted risk for time period. e.g 1-year predicted risk
number of predicted events for time period. e.g. 1-year predicted events
predicted risk for time period and percentile. e.g. predicted_risk_1_year_95ci
Percentile observation value where the percentile_number is for eg. 2_5 for 2.5th percentile, 75 for 75th percentile etc.

Notes: for continuous variables which does not have any other components such as splines

Description: restricted cubic spline. e.g. RCS1 for first component
Notes: for first component use _rsc1, for second component use _rcs2, etc.

Description: categorical variable with number of categories.
Notes: for binary category use _cat1, for three categories use _cat3, etc.
